title: Decision making performance of business analytics capabilities: the role of big data literacy and analytics competency
theoretical_background: Data governance; Big data literacy; Business analytics capabilities
research_description: This study investigates the relationships between data governance, business analytics capabilities, and decision-making performance, with a focus on big data literacy and analytics competency as mediators.
research_results: Findings reveal that data governance and big data literacy are critical antecedents for developing analytical capabilities, improving decision-making performance. Big data literacy and analytics competency mediate the relationships between data governance, business analytics, and decision-making performance.
future_research: Future studies could explore the role of emerging technologies in enhancing decision-making performance across various sectors and countries.
